narrative.narrative: Robin Hood Aviation was based at Graz,Austria and flew from May 2007 to August 23,2011. Its first route was Graz to Zurich,Switzerland. In October 2008 Graz to Stuttgart,Germany opened. In the summer of 2009 it did Klagenfurt,Germany to Zurich,Swizterland. It also did Linz,Austria to Zurich.Its fleet at the end was two Saab 340's. It also did charters.
